content: laid edges by kellie macpherson a simple cable motif down the sides of a plain stockinette sock knit using magic loop yarn dk weight yarn of your choice i used 1 skein of west yorkshire spinners fleece 100% blue faced leicester 224m/244 yards light brown 002 gauge 28 stitches over 4inches 38 row over 4inches on 3mm uk needles please check gauge & adjust needle size if necessary approx foot circumference size 1 8 inches / size 2 8 5 inches / size 3 9 inches materials 3mm or size needed to obtain gauge needles long enough for magic loop cable needle optional stitch markers tapestry needle for closing toe abbreviations k - knit p - purl ktbl knit 1 stitch through the back loop k2tog - knit 2 stitches together p2tog - purl 2 stitches together sl - slip one stitch purl wise right side hold yarn in back wrong side hold yarn in front ssk - slip 1 stitch slip 1 stitch then knit those two stitches together mk1 - make one new stitch bor - beginning of round pm - place marker sm - slip marker k#3 - insert right hand needle into stitch as though to knit wrap yarn 3 times around right needle then knit stitch as normal c3f slip the next stitch onto a cable needle and hold at front of work knit 2 from left hand needle then knit the stitch from the cable needle c3b slip the next two stitches onto a cable needle hold at back of work knit 1 from left hand needle then knit 2 from cable needle ws wrong side rs right side turn turn your piece of work ©kellie a macpherson @myknittedwardrobe / kellieaine@gmail com page 1 of 3 1 cuff size 1/2/3 4 heel turn continues over needle 2 cast on 48/52/56 stitches using preferred cast on method row 1 sl1 p13/14/15 p2tog pl turn row 2 sl1 k5 ssk k1 turn divide stitches over 2 needles 24/26/28 stitches per row 3 sl1 p to 1 stitch before gap p2tog pl turn needle pm for beginning of round row 4 sl1 k to 1 stitch before gap ssk k1 turn row 1 *ktbl p* repeat row 3 and 4 until all stitches have been repeat row 1 fourteen more times worked - 14/16/16 stitches remain 15 row total p across row turn knit across row as follows 2 leg size 1 sl1 k6 pm for new bor k7 14 stitches knit 1 round then begin stitch pattern as follows size 2 sl1 k7 pm for new bor k8 16 stitches stitch pattern - 3 row repeat size 3 sl1 k7 pm for new bor k8 16 stitches row 1 needle 1 k#3 k4 k#3 k12/14/16 k#3 k4 k#3 do not turn work needle 2 k24/26/28 row 2 needle 1 sl1 k4 sl1 k12/14/16 sl1 k4 sl1 4 gusset set up needle 2 k24/26/28 pick up and knit 13/14/15 side seam stitches pm row 3 needle 1
